resources.string: About Us\n The Entrepreneurship Cell is a non-profit organisation run by the students of NIT Raipur that aims at manifesting the latent entrepreneurial spirit of the young students.We at E-Cell host various workshops,innovative games,competitions for the aspiring entrepreneurs and support them by providing necessary resources such as seed funding, mentoring, consultancy and networking.\n E-Cell NITRR is devoted to promoting and helping the young minds in the campus to find the DIAMOND in them.The Committee provides a platform to share their innovations.And the'll be provided with all the help they need to meet their aim.
